idea:
A company originated with the ideology of “ Compost Revolution “and As a Proud Indian and supporting “Make in India” Initiative we have developed our organic waste converter machine with build quality which are best in industry with no compromise on quality and aim to provide such standard with optimized economical solution.

In today’s world where there are various land issues and fast moving life, government find it difficult to organise the solid waste produce by urban area & rural areas and facing various health issues because of it.  Oxycare India has come with the idea to support & reduce the kind of problem by its organic waste composting machine which has multiple benefit. Our machine has gone through high standard & Procedure & produces high quality Compost output.

KOMMPOSTMAN Comes in various size of waste to compost machine capacity which start from 50kg to 2500 kg per day waste processing limit with minimum processing time of 24 hrs to 36 hours for Fully automatic composting process.
name: Oxycare India

idea:
We've made herbal nutrition convenient.
In the fast-paced lifestyles we live, we often seem to neglect our health and well-being. And what is a better way to maintain or improve your health than using natural herbs that are a staple in our ancient Ayurvedic scriptures. Durmeric’s products are designed as a form of “convenient nutrition”, without all the additives & preservatives that plague the so-called “supplements” in the market today. Our products make it very easy to incorporate the goodness of medicinal herbs in your daily regimen.
name: DURMERIC NATURACEUTICALS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Quintessence Health (QH)

A Preventive healthcare social enterprise

A) QH smiles : Preventive & Holistic Dental-care clinics

B) QH diagnosis : Preventive Tele- medicine diagnostic centres (Rural and Urban)

 Preventive & Holistic dental care clinics are a social enterprise, a revolutionary concept that physically manifests the link between 'Oral health' and 'Complete body health' in the form of dental services provide.

to solve the problem of lack of integrated dentistry .

Preventive Tele- medicine diagnostic centres (Rural and Urban) Is a self-sustaining model for social impact in the slums and rural areas of the country to provide easy access to Tele - medicine centres for Rural and Urban women and men of India especially post the COVID-19 Pandemic.

To solve the problem of lack of access to tele- diagnostic centres in country.
name: Dr Karishma vijan
